overview: When Deva Raja Kammath is found dead by drowning in dosa mavu under suspicious circumstances, Raja Raja Kammath, due to depression, kills himself by over dosa ing. Just when everyone thought their business was over, their nephew,a brave konkani would rise from the beaches of Goa to reclaim their throne before Jaahar abdula biriyani shop take's over their business. Join Gautham D Kammath in his best adventure yet, along with his brother Lol anantha Kammath and his girlfriend Queen Mavu, as they try to find out his great grandfather's semen for their decade old recipe with the help of Semenship AK, whose hatred for math would be overcome by his love for kam. Will they be able to find it and be back in business?, will they be able to find the killer?, find out this konkani divas in cinemas near you.
title: Gautam Dosas
